import './App.css'; import { useState } from 'react'; function App() { return (

Firm name



Yoga classes registration form

Kindly fill out the form for joining the Yoga classes at xyz.The monthly fees for the sessions at xyz is INR 500,you can pay any day of the month for taking up the classes for that entire month.You need to be in the age range of 18-65 years and the payment is done on a monthly basis.There are a total of 4 available batches for you namely 6-7 AM, 7-8 AM, 8-9 AM and 5-6 PM,you can choose any of them for a particular month.



Enter your name:

Enter your age:

Enter your email-id:

Enter your phone number:

Enter the batch you want to be in:









); } export default App;
